channel.title: Don't pay the Ferryman - Character Keeper - Feedback requested
channel.description:
Gooday!
just made an excel character keeper for Don't pay the Ferryman (pbta fantasy espionage)
i'm not a wiz kid at excel but I think it works? it requires 3 batches of cut and pasting between tabs.
